main event: A single pentagonal object with bright spots was observed over Lake Charles AFB, Louisiana, for approximately 20 minutes after sunset in February 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed at approximately 30,000 feet altitude., The object appeared to change shape from pentagonal to triangular., It was reported that similar objects were seen in the nearby areas of Memphis and Meridian., Witness believed it could be a weather balloon reflecting light., The witness was positive about the sighting duration and details.
witness description: 22.5-year-old male with 7 years of college education.
